thread.title: Artificial Light: Fake Sunshine Mailer appears in Orlando Mayor race
thread.title_full: Artificial Light: Fake Sunshine Mailer appears in Orlando Mayor race

author: Frank Torres
title: Artificial Light: Fake Sunshine Mailer appears in Orlando Mayor race
text:
Pinterest 0 
Medical Student and Orlando Mayoral Candidate Sunshine Linda Grund took to social media this morning to speak out against a fake mailer that forges her signature. 
“I did not pay or approve this mailer- having my signature on here is a concern. I’m not a lawyer but the other two candidates are and hope they are not affiliated with any of this.” 
The mailer uses Grund’s campaign motto of “Promise, Peace and Purpose” while listing her various accomplishments. It slams incumbent Mayor Buddy Dyer , asking if the community is tired of “Good Ol’ Boy Politics”. It then asks voter to dump Dyer on election day. 
The mailer is paid for by Orlando Woman for Sunshine Grund. The group does not show up in the Division of Elections office. It also forges Grund’s handwritten signature at the bottom right hand corner. 
Grund told the Observer she was told about the mailer from a friend who had received it. She called the appearance of the piece “ugly” and “undermining”. 
Businessman and Veteran Paul Paulson is the third candidate in the race. Election day is November 3rd. You can see the mailers below… Readers who read this, also read these
